SectionBody.Text: In the event that any section or clause hereof shall for any reason be held or declared invalid, the same shall be eliminated and the remaining portion or portions hereof shall remain in full force and effect as if such invalid clause or section had not been incorporated herein, provided that ss. 210.03 and 210.20 are declaratory of the specific legislative intent in the passage of this part, and should either of said sections be declared unconstitutional, ineffective, or invalid, then in such event, the entire part shall become inoperative and void.
